titleStmt.title: Compassionate counsel to all young men especially I. London apprentices, II. students of divinity, physick, and law, III. the sons of magistrates and rich men / by Richard Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.S. and are to be sold by B. Simmons and Jonath. Greenwood,
